title: Understanding the Recommendation
text: The American Academy of Pediatrics recommends screening children at specific ages during their regular pediatric appointments. These ages are crucial for early detection of developmental issues.

title: Focus on Early Childhood
text: The recommended screening ages are during early childhood, a critical period for developmental milestones.

title: Identifying the Correct Ages
text: Consider the ages when children typically undergo significant developmental changes. These are often the focus of pediatric screenings.
